pull.title: script: Make LXC container size suitable for gitian builds
pull.body:
This change prevents "No space left on device" error.

See:
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21036#issuecomment-774771873
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21036#issuecomment-775031315

events.message:
script: Make LXC container size suitable for gitian builds

This change prevents "No space left on device" error.

events.body: Is this only relevant to LXC? KVM uses sized images too, after all.

> Is this only relevant to LXC? KVM uses sized images too, after all.

Right. Did not test KVM-based builds. Will do.
And this is not relevant to Docker.
ACK 166266a372fed2b1f73053084a923fab7edc77f4 - I had to add this manually to my nighly build base image
